attributes.action: Assign a minister of state for care services, who cares.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Brown, could you please assign a Minister of state for Care services, who actually cares about the post they take on. Who has time to spend learning about the plight of carers and the people they care for. Mr Phil Hope stated,caring is a choice, it is not but taking on the post of Minsiter for Care is. this statement shows how out of touch this minister is with this matter.
Please assign someone to the post who has a genuine interest in the cause.
